label: SpecifiedRoute
comment: A specified way or course taken from one location to another.

datatypeProperties.comment: A departure point, expressed as text, for this specified route.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the map of this specified route.
A type, expressed as text, for this specified route.
A code specifying a security level for this transport route.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A means of transport, expressed as text, for this transport route.

objectProperties.comment: The measure of the distance of this specified route.
